cause.description:
Calling on all Junction (Dundas West and Keele) residents and dwellers...
WE ARE NOT SEEKING FUNDS. THIS IS NOT A PLEA FOR YOUR CASH, BUT PERHAPS A LITTLE TIME TO FILL OUT AN ONLINE SURVEY
Petal Corp intends to open a restaurant in the Junction neighborhood of Toronto. We will provide a service to a growing community of young professionals which we beleive to be a silent majority. If you are part of that group of consciencious community and family oriented professional please visit our website :
www.jwcrown.com
Fill out the survey at your convienience which will in turn, help us raise the money we need to make this dream possible...
1. The Junction must improve.
2. Clean up a neighborhood.
3. Be responsible and help build a dream too.
cause.mission: Raise the quality of life in the Juntion.
cause.name: The Junction Betterment Program
